div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo primo die Januarij Anno quo supra

The samyn day comperit mastir Duncan scherar parson of clat befor the
aldirman and balyeis syttand' in Jugement and askit deliuerance and ansuer
of our Souerane lordis lettrez direkit to tham obefor anent the takis of
fischingis and landis that vmquhill Androw scherar' the comburges Josit to
be grantit and Sett to Williame scherar his Sone and ayre for siklik
male and devites as vthiris pais for siclik takis offering him redy to
be Souerte for the said William his brothir sone sene he was his tutour'
to tham for ale his deviteis as vthiris nichtbouris pais for siclike
takis And' thareftir thomas fyf ane of the balyeis of the said' borghe at
commawnd' of our Souerane lordis letter and of the aldirman circualy Inquirit
at the consall and communite And' the mast part of the consall and communite
warnit be the hande bell throw the towne and gathtreit grantit
that the said' William scherar' suld' haf the takis that this fadir
hed'

the samyn day alexander menyeis protestit solempnitlie quhat thinge was
done anent the takis desirit be mastir Duncan scherar' to William
scherar his brothir sone suld' turne him nor his frendis to na preiudice
In the generale assedacion

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiijto die Januarij Anno
quo supra

the samyn day Androu lammyntone callit and nocht comperit to
ansuer to the borghe strekit apon' him be Jonhne lammyntone for the wrang
uys' haldin fra him of fyfty s' with the mair' to the compt and rekning quhar
for the balyeis chargit philp Dunbrek seriand to pas' to the said' Androusis hous'
and tak ane streis' and latt it to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to
the next lauchfull day as the thrid day of proces'

The samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne
assis' Alexander menyeis forspekar that Androw Wenton' and Dauid prat
sal comper one friday that next cumis befor the aldirman and balyeis and
Ilkane of the partiis sale bringe thar resonnis and richtis anent ane
decret p producit be the said' Dauid and vndirly ane assis' that day
quhenthir the saide decret be of vale or nocht

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne mar' forspekar
that malcum crage sal pay to Williame gareache yongar xiij s'
of Siluer quhilk Androw Culan the balye tuk one him to ger
be pait be friday that next cumis

xxvj die Januarij Anno quo supra Andreas Waus constituit dominum Dauid
Waus et magistrum alexandrum fyf coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores in actione
et conuersus inter ipsum et dominum de many penes decim marcas secundum tenorem
acti desuper confect' in vberiore forma procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato cum aliis
clausulis ad huiusmodi procuratorium necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Eodem die thomas Wodman fecit constituit et creauit Andream Wenton'
suum procuratorem legittimum ad petendum et recipiendum quinque marcas a Rectore de oyn
virtute sue obligacionis et Inde acquitand' Ac in omnibus aliis actionibus
ipsum contingentibus promitten' de Rato et grato cum aliis clausulis ad huiusmodi procuratorium
necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviijo
die Januarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day alexander rede Johnne Wormet Androw murray eldar mastir
Richerd of Craufurde and Walter auchneyff was chosin arbitouris ande
suorne the gret bodely aithe In presens of the aldirman and balyeis betuix
Androw Wenton' on that ane part Ande Dauid prat eldar one that vthir
parte anent ale clamys of gudis formalingis controuersiis and debatis debatable'
betuix the said' partiis to gif furtht thar finale sentence and decret arbitrale
tharanent within this tolbutht one friday the ferde day of februare
next hereftir or the Songaing to of that Ilk And' the said' partiis was
oblist and suorne the gret bodely aithe to stande and abide at thar sentence
ande decret vndir the pane of xxti li' scottis money to be rasit apon'
the party brekand' this compromis'

The samyn day Jonhne gilespy suorne the gret aithe deponit he tuk neuire
j li' gret of flandris money fra gayfer portar of brugis one the
behalf of Jonhne Waus burges of abirdene

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
fe Januarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the balyeis Consal ande
communite opinly Inquerit be Androw Culane ane of the balyeis circualy
be his wande In presens of Symon spardour' messinger of our Souerane
lorde declarit and schew that tha wyst neuire sere Jonhne ruthirfurd'
aldirman nor Richerd' ruthirfurd' his brothir Inquiet wex nor' trubull
Jonhne Waus in his wattir nor takis nor yet nayne vthiris nor
did' nay molestacion trubull nor greyf to nay Induellar' of the
said' burghe' vthir wais thane law and reson' will Apon' the quhilkis
the said' aldirman tuk Instrument of sere Jonhne stirueling' notar to the quhilkis
the balyeis Consal and communite grantit thar common Sell be Sett

Eodem die Willelmus quhit fecit constituit creauit et nominauit dominum
Johannem ruthirfurde prepositum suum procuratorem legittimum ad petendum recipiendem et exigendum
a Roberto ouchterles' xlvi s' et octo d' et Inde acquitand' prosequend'
agend' et defendend' promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo die februa
rij Anno quosupra

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisiciones dominj Jacobi Raburne capellanj
div.p:
Dauid menyeis Junior thomas prat Johannes Wormet Willelmus Kintor Willelmus
blinsele alexander nachty Jacobus Kennarty Johannes lundoris Magnus Wormet
gilbertus chamer alexander chamer in schipraw Johannes steuart Jacobus crage thomas
quhit et Johannes myll Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes Raburne cognatus
domini Jacobi Raburne capellanum obiit vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Roberti quhit ex boriali
et communes vias regias versus austrum oriens et occidens Et quod dictus dominus
Jacobus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam cognati suj
terre Et quod est legittime etatis Et valet nunc per annum xx s' et valuit tantum tempore
pacis Et tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit in manibus Isabelle Relicte quondam nicholaij loremar' racione
coniuncte infeodacionis et Andree smitht per alienacionem sasinam ac possessionem
sibi tradit' per quondam Robertum buchan per spacium duorum annuorum aut eocirca

Idem dicunt quod dominus Jacobus Raburne capellanus est legittimus ac propinquior filius
et heres quondam Eduardi Raburne patris sui et cetera non obiit vestitus de quibusquibus
terris siue annuis Redditibus infra dictum burgum

The samyn day it was decretit and deliuerit be warde of the court and gevin
for dome that Androw Waus sall content and pay to gilbert Waus of many
tene markis Scottis money becaus' he falyeit in his preyf as he that
tuk to preyf the said' money pait this day and falyeit tharintill

the xiiij day of februar' thomas fyf and James Kintor oblist thame
be the fathis of thar bodiis lelely and treuly be all thar landis and gudis
to content and pay ane hammybir' barrell of Salmond' sufficient'
merchand' gude to thome menyeis In the name of philp Dunbreke
and to releyf the said' philp tharanent and keip him skathles and fre tharof
befor quhatsumeuire Jugis in the sikirast wys' of off obligacioun coniunctlie and
Seueralie Renunciand' all benefice of diuision' all fraude and gill
avay putt and Ilkan of the said thomas and James ar oblist tile vthiris
Ilkan to pay the ta demi of the said j barrelis Salmond'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviij die februarij anno quo supra

the samyn day alexander matheson' grantit him awand' to James leslie
leis viij s' and iij d' for iij eln' of blew clath to be pait be pasche next
to cum

the samyn day it was fundin be ane Suorne assis' that Jonhne laynge
sall content and pay to cristy prat ane wedir at pasche siclik as the
layf was that he bocht fra him for the pament of the quhilk James
of Kennarty eldar come Souerte to the balyeis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxi die februarij quo supra

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' that canny giffard
and hir husband' or ane vthir leill man in hir hand' sal suer the gret
aithe that William lammyntone gaf hir the demi vnicorne that scho
schew in the tolbutht quhilk Is nocht gude and the said' William sall
mak pament to hir for the said' demi vnicorne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die februarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' alexander
rede forspekar of the samyn that Jacob grot the estirlyne hede sauld'
his ry to Jonhne colison' and thomas prat Ilkan chaldir for ij ros'
noblis of gelde Ande William buchan the baxtar sall gif the said Jacob
tua ros' noblis for euere chaldir that he bocht and resauit fra him or
ellis ples' him for the ros' noblis and he falye that he gett tham to him
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die marcij anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Johannes Stewin est
legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Richardi stewin patris suj
Igitur datum fuit Andree Cullane vnj balliuorum in mandatis ad
Cognoscendum dictum Johannem ad terras et annuos redditus sibi infra
burgum Jure hereditario contingen' vt decet filium et heredem burgensem
Cognosci secundum laudabiles consuetudines burgorum

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo die mensis marcij
Anno quo supra

The samyn day Dauid menyeis yongar and Jonhne Colison' was chosin
commissaris be the consale and communite to pas' to Edinburghe the xvj day of
marche Instant to common' witht vthiris commissaris of burrouis for the
distinction' of the letter of merk gevin to the cullinaris be the kinge
of Romans And' for the gude of merchandice And' atour thai chesit
Androw culan yongar Jonhne moire Dauid prat and William andirson'
to extent tene li' amang' merchand' mene excerceand' merchandice
to thar expens quhilk was suorne to extent' the samyn eftir thare
knaulage and eftir the quantite and faculte of thar gudis

the saide day Jonhne andirson Sone and ayr to vmquhile
Jonhne andirson' grantit him awand' j barrel of Salmond'
sufficient merchande gude to Jonhne Wormet to be pait be
the next mydsomer or viij dais thareftir be the fatht of
his body but fraude and gile

The tene day of marche Alexander angouson' come dettour
to thome fyf the balye to pay to Androu mureson' xxviij s'
of Siluer within terme of law for Jok cuminge in Retre And' atour
the saide alexander is becumin Souerte for samekile mair' as the
saide Androw cane lauchfullie recouer apon' the saide Jonhne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiiij die marcij Anno quo supra

The samyn day comperit Androw Culan cessionar and assignay to mathow
Culan and producit In Jugement ane ak extretit out of the chavmerlane
Courte contening and proporting that agnes club the relict of vmquhile
thomas culane suld' amend' and mak the land' liand' in the gastraw
gevin hir' als' gude as it was In tyme of the deces of the saide
thomas and that hir coniunctfeftment suld' be constrenyet tharfor And' the
deliuerance ande decret of Certane Suorne personis quhilkis fand'
the said' lande was xxti li' thane it was In tyme of deces' of the
saide thomas And' thareftir the saide Androw askit the balyeis to pas'
and constrenye the saide Agnes gudis and coniunctfeftment for the pament of
the saide xx li' And' the balyeis vndirstandinge this peticion resona
bile as efferit thame of thar office passit cerssit and soucht the
gudis of the saide Agnes Ande fand' nayne except' certane beir'
quhilkis was prisit be suorne personis vnsuspek to thre li' quhilkis
was deliuerit to the saide Androw And' for the pament of the xvij li'
restand' of the said' xx li' thai passit till ane Croft liand' one the
southt syde of the kingis gate passande fra the crabstane to the borne that
was vmquhile the saide thomas and gevin to the saide Agnes in coniunctfeft
ment and causit alexander rede Johnne Waus alexander nachty William Kintor
and henry bawne be suorne the richt aithe In Jugement to pris' the
saide croft to the vtyr waill quhilkis riplie avisit be thar'
aithez' prisit the saide croft wortht xl s' of maile In the yer'
and tharof it aw x s' of annuell and lymmit and assignit the saide croft to
the saide Androw for xi yeris In the pament of the saide xvij li'
eftir the tenor of akis maide tharapon' obefor befor the chavmerlane and the
decret of Suorne personis

the saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde' aldirman producit and causit to be rede
ane assedacion' vndir the common' Sell of the saide burghe of ane demi nethis
fischinge of the raik Sett to him for xix yeris quhilkis the balyeis consell
and communite gathtreit for the tyme grantit nay man sayand in the contrar'

the saide day the aldirman ordanit William futhes to pay xl s'
of his wattir maile to Will lutar and takis his acquitance
tharof

div.head: Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonogesimo primo
div.p: Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvjo die marcij Anno Domini et cetera nonogesimo

the saide day sere Johnne ruthirfurde aldirman producit and schew ane
assedacion' vndir the commone Sell of ane demi nethis fischinge of
the raik and the landis of lit tulloche set to him for xix yeris quhilk
was rede opinly to the haill Consale and communite warnit be the hande
bell and the officiaris throu the haill towne and gathtreit to gif ansuer to
the kingis lettres quhilk assedacione the saide haill towne grantit and
affermit ney mane sayand in the Contrar' befor thir witnes mastir Dauid
guthtre prouest of the samyn mastir Duncan scherar parson of clat sere thomas
myrton' vicar' of Kynauchmond' William blinsele and sere Robert leis
